sentences.en: Don't use such slangy expressions in your essays.
sentences.cn: 别在你们的文章里用这样的俚语措辞.

sentences.en: The play was full of slangy dialogue.
sentences.cn: 剧中充斥了大量俚语对话。

sentences.en: These slangy words have long fallen out of English.
sentences.cn: 这些俚语在英语中早就不用了.

sentences.en: This slangy word is falling off from English.
sentences.cn: 这个俚语在英语中使用得越来越少.

words.tran_cn: 使用俚语的表现法；多俚语的作品

trans.tran_en: Slangy speech or writing has a lot of slang in it
